learning_objective: Use flowcharts and/or pseudocode to address complex problems as algorithms.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is working on a digital video project that involves multiple shots at different locations, some special effects, and post-production editing. Which of the following sequence of steps best represents a flowchart for this video production?",
    "Answer1": "Brainstorm Idea -> Design Props -> Start Filming -> Add Special Effects -> Review",
    "Answer2": "Research -> Storyboard -> Venue Scouting -> Filming -> Editing -> Review",
    "Answer3": "Start Filming -> Crazy Special Effects -> Finish Filming",
    "Answer4": "Storyboard -> Start Filming -> Video Editing -> Add special effects",
    "CorrectAnswer": "2",
    "Explanation": "Video production can be complex. Mapping it out like a flowchart: 'Research -> Storyboard -> Venue Scouting -> Filming -> Editing -> Review' can help Alex organize and execute their production effectively."
}
